articles.author: Nick Lichtenberg, Fortune Intelligence
articles.title: American Express just offered a rare peek inside the spending habits of wealthy Americans—all the way down to Gen Z - Fortune
articles.description: The company reported record quarterly revenue of $17.9 billion, with millennial spending up 10% and Gen Z spend an astonishing 40%.
articles.content: When American Express unveiled its second-quarter 2025 results on Friday, it didnt just announce another round of record-breaking earnings. It offered a rare, high-definition snapshot of how affluent… [+5687 chars]
